channel.title: solaris on pekdon
channel.description: Recent content in solaris on pekdon

item.title: Sun Blade 1500 on Solaris 10
item.description: A while back I was fortunate enough to be given a Sun Blade 1500 from a long time pekwm user. It is, by todays standards, old and slow making it perfect for experiencing how pekwm actually performs. Also, running Solaris 10, being big endian and using Xsun instead of a current Xorg server makes it perfect to find odd issues. I had a few issues with getting machine up and running, the PSU and harddrive experienced some post storage issues.
